cause.description:
United Way is working to advance the common good by focusing on education, income and health. These are the building blocks for a good life - a quality education that leads to a stable job, enough income to support a family through retirement and good health.
Our goal is to create long-lasting changes that prevent problems from happening in the first place. We invite you to be a part of this change. Together, united, we can inspire hope and create opportunities for a better tomorrow.
1. Education: Helping children and youth achieve their potential
2. Income: Promoting financial stability and independence
3. Health: Improving people's health
cause.name: LIVE UNITED
